name: Pimento Cheese
description: Do we really need a spread that's primarily cheese and mayonnaise? In the case of pimento cheese, the answer is yes.
recipeIngredient: 1 7-oz jar pimentos, drained and finely diced

recipeInstructions.text: In a medium bowl mix together cheese, mayonnaise, pimentos, hot sauce, and cayenne. Serve immediately or store in an airtight container in the refrigerator for up to a week.
